channel.title: Max server capacity about 25= server crash need help
channel.description:
i have had this problem in the past and still have it:
once my server fills up to about 25 people it crashes because of CPU usage
how can i increase my max cap so the server doesnt crash with more than 25 people in it?

item.title: Max server capacity about 25= server crash need help
item.dc:creator: @Ledgend Ledgend
item.description:
@Ledgend wrote:

Yea but when your pc has to run everything else then it cant hold the same as a same memory server

Read full topic
item.source: Max server capacity about 25= server crash need help
